choices.label: The figure presents a graph of a curve in a plane. The horizontal axis is labeled Horizontal Position, and the points Position A and Position B is located at the beginning and end of the horizontal axis respectively. The vertical axis is labeled Angular Momentum. The curve begins near the bottom of the vertical axis, just above position A and forms a concave down parabolic curve through the plane, ending approximately at the same vertical level as it started, just above Position B.
